item.title: CRTO review
item.description: intro I recently passed the Red Team Ops course by Zero-Point Security. I picked up the course while it was on sale. It seemed like an affordable course that would build upon the knowledge learned while acquiring my OSCP. I completed the exam recently and thought writing a brief review would be nice. Red Team Ops is a course by Zero-Point Security that focuses on teaching “the basic principles, tools and techniques, that are synonymous with red teaming.
